commit message: Upgrade to support library 23.2.1
Close cursor used for finding the issue to delete
Disable Analytics for debug builds
Use the filesystem with the largest available space on Kitkat and later devices
Bump version to 23

Revert 'Use the filesystem with the largest available space on Kitkat and
later devices' as DownloadManager only accepts primary external storage
device

This reverts commit 2b718d87359f6b2155486726e71a2ef2e7fcbfa6.
Replace Spring REST template with OKHtttp
Fix unit tests by replacing TextUtils with Apache Commons StringUtils

Replace login/logout cycle with persistent cookie jar to stay logged in
Replace specific auto download time with constantly repeating alarm
Extract NotificationService
Move DownloadCompletedBroadcastReceiver into narrower scope
Remove obsolete REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS permission
Make repeating alarm trigger more specifically
Bump version
Handle inexisting issue requested error
Update build tools
Move code making sure Wifi connection is available into WifiCommandExecutor. Move download logic into IssueDownloader.
Use Evernote's Job API to schedule jobs
Update last wakeup time in preferences info
Use exact timing if Job API V14 proxy is used to make it use RTC_WAKEUP
Check if user is logged in before requesting PDF download URL to differentiate between unavailable issue and invalid login. Fine tune Job retry logic.

Merge pull request #45 from notizklotz/autorepeat

Remove transparency for grid item footer

Use HIGH PERF wifi lock to potentially make wifi connection on wakeup more reliable
